value.title: Quickly create Power BI reports in Power BI Service
value.excerpt: Welcome to my new Power BI session to demonstrate the new feature which is just been rolled out by Microsoft. Now, we can quickly create reports using the Power BI Service itself. We don’t need to open the Power BI Desktop for the same. This new feature is being rolled out from December 2020 Power BI
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/9vAtJHVmCVI" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Remove or Unpublish “Publish to Web” Power BI Report
value.excerpt: In this video, we will talk the procedure of removing a Power BI report after it has been publishing to web and anonymously accessed on web.  Sometimes, there is a situation where we have published a report with web option and generated iframe code to embed the report in our custom application. Now,

value.title: Show/Hide Multiple Data Values using TME AG Toggle Switch – Custom Visual – Toggle Switch by TME AG
value.excerpt: During this session, we will explore one of the custom visuals in Power BI which is TME AG Toggle Switch in Power BI.   Sometimes, we need to show/hide data values based on Toggle Switch. Let’s consider one real-life example where we need to show Weekend and Weekday data. I want to provide one switch

value.title: Sort a table using Multiple Columns in Power BI | Multi Column Sort in Power  BI
value.excerpt: In this vLog, we will learn, how we can sort a tale using multiple columns for the table visualization in Power BI.  This feature has been rolled out in March 2020 Power BI Desktop Update.  Here, first we will learn how we can create apply a sort for the multiple column. Then we will change the sort

value.title: Avoid Left Outer Joins with DirectQuery in Power BI
